landing.pageTitle: AgentStudio - Agent Workspace | Powered by Claude Agent SDK
landing.metaDescription: Agent for Work - Your local Agent workspace powered by Claude Agent SDK. Fully private data, scheduled tasks, A2A protocol, and custom agents.

hero.title: Agent for Work
hero.subtitle: Your Local Agent Workspace
hero.description: A truly private AI assistant running on your computer. Your data stays local, with scheduled task automation and multi-agent collaboration.
hero.installHint: Copy the command below and run it in your terminal to get started

preview.title: Product Preview
preview.subtitle: Intuitive Web interface for efficient AI work
preview.chatCaption: Chat Interface - Talk to Agent with visual tool execution
preview.mcpCaption: MCP Management - One-click import Claude Code config

features.title: Core Features
features.subtitle: A complete solution for AI work automation

localWorkspace.title: Local Agent Workspace
localWorkspace.point1: Runs on your computer - a true local workspace
localWorkspace.point2: Data is fully private, never uploaded to cloud
localWorkspace.point3: Files, code, and conversations under your control

webExperience.title: Web-Based Experience
webExperience.point1: Say goodbye to CLI, embrace a friendly Web interface
webExperience.point2: Visual tool execution makes conversations come alive
webExperience.point3: Built-in file browser to view project files alongside chat

sdkFeatures.title: Claude Agent SDK Full Suite
sdkFeatures.anthropicCompat: Supports Claude, GLM, DeepSeek, Kimi K2, MiniMax and other models compatible with Anthropic API

scheduler.title: Let Agents Run on Schedule
scheduler.description: True AI work automation! Set time rules and your Agent will automatically handle repetitive tasks, freeing up your time.

scenario1.title: Daily Progress Report
scenario1.desc: Every day at 9 AM, automatically generate project progress report

scenario2.title: Auto Code Review
scenario2.desc: Check code repository every 2 hours, automatically submit review comments

scenario3.title: Weekly Meeting Summary
scenario3.desc: Every Friday, automatically compile and archive weekly meeting notes

scenario4.title: Monthly Data Analysis
scenario4.desc: On the 1st of each month, automatically generate business data analysis report

a2a.title: Agent Collaboration Network
a2a.description: Connect multiple agents into a collaborative network. Local and remote agents work together, building your personal AI team.

scenario1.title: Secretary Agent Dispatch
scenario1.desc: A secretary Agent receives tasks and dispatches other project Agents to execute specific work

scenario2.title: Local ‚Üî Remote Collaboration
scenario2.desc: Agents on your local machine and remote dev server communicate and collaborate on tasks

scenario3.title: Mobile Access Anywhere
scenario3.desc: Interact with local Agents via mobile messaging, work from anywhere (Beta)

customAgent.title: Build Your Own Agent
customAgent.description: No coding required - customize your Agent through the UI. Built-in Claude Code Agent ready to use, suitable for various work scenarios.

comparison.title: AgentStudio vs Claude Code
comparison.subtitle: Same Claude Agent SDK, friendlier experience

quickStart.title: Quick Start
quickStart.subtitle: Choose your preferred installation method and start using within minutes
quickStart.endUserDescription: No configuration needed, auto-installs all dependencies, perfect for quick experience and daily use
quickStart.developerDescription: Full development environment, supports hot reload, perfect for custom development and feature extension

cta.title: Ready to start your AI work automation?
cta.subtitle: One command to launch your local Agent workspace

footer.description: Agent for Work - Your local Agent workspace powered by Claude Agent SDK.

memorySettings.title: Global Memory Settings
memorySettings.description: Global memory is shared background information for all AI assistants, including your work preferences, project information, etc.
memorySettings.fileSourceInfo: Content is sourced from the ~/.claude/CLAUDE.md file in your user directory.
memorySettings.placeholder: Write your global memory content here...
memorySettings.infoAutoLoad: Global memory will be automatically loaded in every conversation to provide background information for AI
memorySettings.infoSuggestions: Recommended to include: work preferences, project background, personal information, etc.

currentSupplier.title: Current Supplier
currentSupplier.clickToCheck: Click "Check Supplier" to get supplier info
currentSupplier.info1: Claude Code is an AI programming assistant that supports code generation, editing and project management
currentSupplier.info2: Node.js is the fundamental runtime environment for the system
currentSupplier.info3: Supports multiple package managers: npm, pnpm, yarn (Priority: pnpm > yarn > npm)
currentSupplier.info4: The system will automatically select the preferred package manager for update operations
currentSupplier.info5: It is recommended to keep Claude Code up to date for the best experience

cloudflare.title: Cloudflare Tunnel
cloudflare.description: Enable public internet access with one click using Cloudflare Tunnel

intro.title: Welcome to Cloudflare Tunnel
intro.description: Cloudflare Tunnel allows you to expose your local AgentStudio to the internet without needing a public IP address.
intro.benefit1: No public IP or router configuration needed
intro.benefit4: Free to use, quick to deploy
intro.req3: Docker or cloudflared CLI (to run the tunnel)

credentials.step1: Visit Cloudflare Dashboard to create an API Token
credentials.step3: Copy your Account ID and API Token

create.description: Now you can create your first Tunnel. You can customize the subdomain prefix or leave it empty for auto-generation.

start.nextStep: Now you need to start the cloudflared client to establish the connection.
start.needToStartClient: Tunnel is created, but you still need to start the cloudflared client to establish the connection. Follow the steps below.

done.title: Setup Complete!
done.description: Your AgentStudio is now accessible via the public internet
done.keepClientRunning: Keep the cloudflared client running to maintain public access.

credentials.title: Cloudflare Credentials
credentials.help: Get API Token and Account ID from

mcpAdmin.title: MCP Admin Server
mcpAdmin.subtitle: Configure MCP Admin API to allow external AI tools to manage your AgentStudio
mcpAdmin.noKeysHint: Create an API key to allow external tools to access
mcpAdmin.confirmRevoke: Are you sure you want to revoke this API key? This action cannot be undone.
mcpAdmin.fullPermissions: This key will have full admin permissions
mcpAdmin.saveKeyWarning: Save this key now! It will only be shown once and cannot be viewed again.

help.title: MCP Admin Server Help
help.whatIsDesc: MCP Admin Server is a standard MCP (Model Context Protocol) server that allows other AI tools (like Cursor, Claude Desktop) to remotely manage your AgentStudio via MCP protocol. Through this interface, you can directly query and manage AgentStudio's projects, agents, MCP servers, etc. from other AI tools.
help.step1: Create an Admin API key on this page
help.step2: Click "View Config" to get the configuration snippet
help.step3: Add the config to Cursor or Claude Desktop's MCP configuration file
help.step4: Restart Cursor/Claude Desktop, then you can use the management tools in conversations
help.examplePrompt: In Cursor, you can directly say to AI:

apiSettings.title: API Server Settings
apiSettings.settingsSavedRefresh: Settings saved. Page will refresh to apply new settings

usage.title: Usage Instructions:
usage.production: For production environment, use your server domain such as
usage.cors: Ensure the server supports CORS access and allows frontend domain access
usage.refresh: Page needs to be refreshed after modification to take effect

telemetry.title: Telemetry & Analytics
telemetry.enableDescription: Help improve AgentStudio by sharing anonymous usage data
telemetry.statusEnabled: Telemetry is enabled. Thank you for helping improve AgentStudio!
telemetry.statusDisabled: Telemetry is disabled. No data is being collected.

collect.installIdDesc: A random UUID to distinguish installations, not linked to your identity
collect.versionDesc: Helps us understand which versions and platforms are most used
collect.featuresDesc: Which features are used (without content or personal data)
collect.errorsDesc: Sanitized error messages and stack traces (file paths removed)

neverCollect.files: File contents, code, or project data

telemetry.privacyNoteDesc: All telemetry data is anonymized and aggregated. We cannot identify individual users. You can disable telemetry at any time.

consent.title: Help Improve AgentStudio
consent.subtitle: Anonymous usage data
consent.description: We collect anonymous usage data to understand how AgentStudio is used and to improve the experience. No personal information is collected.
consent.changeAnytime: You can change this setting anytime in Settings ‚Üí Telemetry.
